attributes.action: Confirm that the fine city of Norwich is unquestionably the Pride of East Anglia, and should be considered seriously for: (i) Hosting at least part of the 2012 Olympic Games, and (ii) be designated a place of outstanding beauty and put forward as a potential 'European City of Culture'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You know it makes sense - why should London get all the infrastructure upgrades ? And please note....Ipswich is not a city....

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
